Text: i vaguely remember this movie.  was a while ago for sure.
Compared to the apes of 2011. this one is far way better ;)

I believe the 2011 Rise of the Apes is a prequel to the original 60s Planet of the Apes.  The 2001 remake is okay but not as good as the original.  Better effects, sure, but the script of the original is far better.
I have wanted to see this one. Possible to release it for ipod soon?

Nice that you are doing older ones to!

Personally i found the prequel of 2011 way better then this remake of the original.
